snippet: Novak Djokovic extended his winning streak to 13 matches with a 6-2, 6-1 win over Martin Klizan in the second round of the Shanghai Masters.
abstract: Novak Djokovic beats Martin Klizan in second round at Shanghai Masters for his 13th straight victory.
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic extended his winning streak to 13 matches with a 6-2, 6-1 win over Martin Klizan in the second round of the Shanghai Masters.
